channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- UrbanCode Deploy (UCD)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- UrbanCode Deploy (UCD)

item.title: CVE-2022-46771|2024-08-03T14:39:38.963Z -- ibm -- urbancode%20deploy%20%28ucd%29
item.description: IBM UrbanCode Deploy (UCD) 6.2.0.0 through 6.2.7.18, 7.0.5.0 through 7.0.5.13, 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.2.9, 7.2.0.0 through 7.2.3.2 and 7.3.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 242273.
